3: My duty is to purify the battlefield.
I'll show you what I've got!
The crimson lotus is in full bloom!
Just as the last Corrupted falls, you hear the unstable female electronic voice once more.
Area cleared. All enemies have been eliminated. Please proceed to the next area.

2: Keep up the good work, everyone.

3: Lotus and the other Construct frames remain silent. They have not been programmed to respond to combat-unrelated communication.
Recommended Strategy: Current damage will not affect the team's combat performance. Please proceed to the next area.

2: Data might not suffer injuries, but I sure will.

3: You have currently suffered zero injuries, Commandant.
Are not the best soldiers those who fully carry out the commandant's orders?

2: I don't want to use soldiers like pawns.

3: After a brief rest, please proceed to the next area.
